channel.title: Clean server source?!
channel.description:
Hey
I want to start programming, but i can't find any source that I like. Looking for a PI or Delta with no skills in it. [i](If there are skills in a source, but is done very well, I will have a look aswell.)[/i] I also don't want to spend a week on cleaning it from death code and stuf .. It's alright if it has combat.
Want source that's is coded clean and no crap in it. [b]Any suggestion is welcome.[/b]
if you don't like this topic, just leave, i will ignore their post anyway ..
Thanks Flexz

item.title: Clean server source?!
item.dc:creator: @flexz999 flexz999
item.description:
@flexz999 wrote:

Clawz fury:

http://mirror.nikkii.us/

Thanks

Just 1 more question …
I had a source that had worked out combat very well…
But for some reason i can’t find it

Now the real problem is that I have a friend willing to learn some java with RSPS, but hes not ready to start from one of these clean source’s, and it will take some time till i can get something good from scratch …

So need a source with combat, skills doesn’t matter at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean server source?!
item.dc:creator: @flexz999 flexz999
item.description:
@flexz999 wrote:

Well, the Rune-source suggestion…
It seems i can’t find it anywhere …

Problem:

  • The searching thing on the forum doesn’t accept ‘-’ so it are 2 words.
  • looking on google only gives me ’ RuneSource/Azure v3’ or other stuff, not the base itself.

Edit: found this, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,462049.msg3380039.html#msg3380039
But no download or so?

Read full topic

item.title: Clean server source?!
item.dc:creator: @flexz999 flexz999
item.description:
@flexz999 wrote:

I have searched before, it’s just not easy to find a clean one, most of them claim that it is clean, when its full of crap or death code …

Read full topic

item.title: Clean server source?!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

He may have asked for Delta or PI, but all three servers are based around the same design so he should have no problem programming on rune-source compared to PI or Delta. If he truly wants to learn he should start with a server with less bad habits. Delta and PI are both horribly done and the years of patches here and there show it. I must also add he asked for a clean source with out crappy code which pretty much throws out Delta and PI.

He can also use the search button to find a source, since requesting one isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean server source?!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:5, topic:485067”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=603302.msg4222838#msg4222838 date=1360862024]
oh look Rune-source is cleaner and also has NIO.
[/quote]
don’t think he could handle using that tbh its too blank, and azure is pretty shit[/quote]

Are you stupid or something?

He asked for a clean source, Rune-Source is the very definition of clean. I want you to take Rune-Source and compare it to your cleaned delta servers you will then see what clean is, although some of the things in Rune-Source could be changed to make developing more easier. Some ideas would be a start on making it more abstract and keep the core as clean as possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean server source?!

item.description:

oh look Rune-source is cleaner and also has NIO.
[/quote]
don’t think he could handle using that tbh its too blank, and azure is pretty shit[/quote]

Don’t say I can’t handle something?
I got great points for java in school without doing a thing …
So I’m looking for new thing to learn!

Read full topic
